mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.type AS "type", a.content AS "content", a.sg_type AS "sgType", a.sb_time AS "sbTime", a.file AS "file", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO czz_aqsgbg( id, name, type, content, sg_type, sb_time, file, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{type}, #{content}, #{sgType}, #{sbTime}, #{file}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE czz_aqsgbg SET name = #{name}, type = #{type}, content = #{content}, sg_type = #{sgType}, sb_time = #{sbTime}, file = #{file}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
